name: Mushroom Lentil & Bean Stew
description: Prepare Vegetable Broth ahead of time. Make a big batch of broth to use for cooking soups, sauces, and grains, like rice or quinoa.
preparation: Heat oil in Wok over medium-high heat. Add celery and cook until softened, about 4 min. Add mushrooms and cook until lightly browned, about 4â€”6 min.
Drain and rinse lentils and beans. Add both to wok with dip mix and broth; stir to combine. Bring to a boil and simmer until slightly thickened, about 3 min.
Divide stew between 4 bowls and top with 1 tbsp yogurt.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 2 cups leafy greens and 1 tbsp of your favourite Epicure Salad Dressing.
